data.what_is:
CleverTap is the all-in-one engagement platform that helps brands unlock limitless customer lifetime value by helping them create personalized experiences to retain their most valuable customers. The platform empowers businesses to orchestrate experiences for individuals across their lifecycles and design personalized journeys that span a lifetime.  It offers analytics that encompasses every aspect of the lifecycle, enabling businesses to measure and optimize each experience in real time. Its unique AI capability is insightful, empathetic, and prescriptive, facilitating smarter and faster decisions. The all-in-one platform unifies experiences from every touchpoint, paving the way for a new era of customer engagement.

The platform is powered by TesseractDB(tm) - the world's first purpose-built database for customer engagement, offering both speed and economies of scale.

CleverTap is trusted by 2000 customers, including Electronic Arts, TiltingPoint, Gamebasics, Big Fish, MobilityWare, TED, English Premier League, TD Bank, Carousell, AirAsia, Papa John's, and Tesco.

Backed by leading investors such as Peak XV Partners, Tiger Global, Accel, CDPQ and 360 One, the company is headquartered in Mountain View, California, with presence in San Francisco, New York, Sao Paulo, Bogota, London, Amsterdam, Sofia, Dubai, Mumbai, Bangalore, Singapore, and Jakarta.

For more information, visit clevertap.com or follow us on:
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/clevertap/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CleverTap
data.product_description: CleverTap is the leading mobile marketing platform that helps marketers and growth teams understand, segment and engage their users for increased retention, customer lifetime value, and campaign ROI.The world's best growth marketers use CleverTap for user engagement, retention, and increasing customer LTV.CleverTap offers a powerful analytics platform and segmentation engine with a sophisticated suite of engagement tools, so growth teams can better understand user behavior and create successful engagement campaigns that keep users coming back.With CleverTap customers get access to:- A complete retention solution - eliminates the need to stitch together multiple point products- Hyper-personalization at scale - proven to improve user engagement and retention by 5x, which leads to faster growth- Enterprise grade - highest standards of privacy and security, unmatched throughput, and true in-the-moment engagements- TesseractDB(tm) - the world's first purpose-built database for user engagement and retention

initial_reviews.review_title: Automation & User Behaviour Analytics at its best!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Clevertap is a very user friendly tool, makes life very easy in terms of setting up campaigns and journeys. The product documentation is well versed to make you understand the tool in depth. The amount of information that you can get about a user from this platform is amazing. We have run quite alot of personalised and user centric campaigns and seen really good results.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Due to the sheer size of data that this platform holds, we face some issues with the loading speed.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
The main goal that Clevertap helps us solve is creating awareness and lead generation about a new product we have launched. Since our usecase is very specific with respect to, that we only want to communicate to the audience who is a user of our app. It gives us very high reachibaility and we can easily communicate with our users from multiple channels.

initial_reviews.review_title: The CRM is very user friendly and easy to use and understand with a good tracking mechanism
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Easy to use, 'Ask feature' on Clevertap, Customization with respect to campaigns, Extensive user journeys can be created, Features like 'RFM', 'Revenue tracking', 'NPS user survey', Tracking for every campaign, Customer support with respect to a dedicated Relationship manager and aslo 'Ticket  support', Getting a new partner is also easy since vendors are easy to integrate with the system.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Segmentation with respect to Campaigns still needs improvement- as in we need to create multiple cohorts for one campaign as there is no possibility of segmenting with 'OR' and we still have to use 'AND' for most of the campaigns.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Tracking every campaign

Automating Onboaring User journeys
Personalised campaign for various cohorts
Overall system and control group conversions through different channels like Email, sms, push, whatsapp, etc.

Real impact via campaigns

initial_reviews.review_title: The best engagement tool out there currently!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Have been using clevertap over 2 years now. Also, having used other engagement tools, I can rightly say that the UX and the ease of integration that Clevertap has with the number of features it offers is awesome! Wait, that's just not the good part. Starting from implementing Clevertap in my current company to post implementation support was phenomenol. As a product manager you'd want to have tools with you that helps your life, Clevertap does just that! Kudos to the clevertap team for building such great product!

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
I feel it can still enhance its AI capabilites even further, right now its a bit limited.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We need to send a lot of PNs, Email and texts notifcations to our customers after onbaording during certain step of the journey. For example, "if a customer is not converting from step A to step B within X amount of time then perform certain actions that nudegs Y% of customer to do certain actions" This is by far my majority of use case as a product manager.  This requires a lot of speed a quick building an implementation and sync between Mixpanel and Clevertap, it helps me acheive this way quicker than other engagement tools.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about CleverTap?

initial_reviews.review_title: A vital tool for boosting user engagement and retention
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
I have been using CleverTap for over 5 years, and it has become the core of our Growth tools. With its multiple available channels, Journeys tool, Intent-Based Segments, and RFM analysis, CleverTap enables us to automate business rules to increase user retention, reactivate inactive users, streamline onboarding for new users, and build loyalty among our best customers.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
It remains a platform where heavy reliance on constant developer support is needed to fully leverage its potential. Additionally, it would be beneficial if they expanded the options for predefined templates for In-App banners more frequently.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
CleverTap has been the essential tool for executing our growth strategies, significantly improving activation, retention, and engagement. By leveraging CleverTap's analytics capabilities and automating business rules with Journeys, we have reduced churn during the registration process by 30% and increased activation rates by 50%.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best Engagement & Retention tool in the market
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
CleverTap offers a combination of capabilities which include personalized engagement, analytics and several automation features. This makes it a comprehensive solution which is very useful when building and optimizing customer engagement and it supports multiple communication channels, example: push notifications, email, SMS, in-app messages. We find this versatility to be very valuable since it enables us to reach users across mediums, hence increasing success of our engagement campaigns.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
The applicability of AI/ML can be further enhanced. Currently, it is available for functionalities within campaign-builder, but there can be a layer such that it can be accessed across entire workflow.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
The combination of analytics and powerful segmentation options means that we can quickly create cohorts of users basis multiple criteria. These can then be targeted via automated journeys. This has proved to be very useful in reactivating dormant users or users at risk of churn. The platform aids our decision making process as well.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great solution for Marketers
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Clevertap is very easy to use for Marketers, only needed some initial setup which will be assisted by Clevertap team also.

We really like the Journey feature, where we can setup a predefined, targeted, and automated series of marketing campaigns using various channels such as Push Notifications, Email, and In-App Banner.

Some features such as RFM Segmentation can really help in giving engagement in a quick way to our most valuable users or the dormant potential users to be reactivated again.

The Customer Support is also superb, we have a bi-weekly session to check if we experience any difficulties or if Clevertap have any ideas on how to improve the campaigns. Every Quarter, Clevertap team would also give Quarterly review to improve the business.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
I have seen other similar solution have a Nudges/Spotlight feature that can highlight specific area of the app to the user, but I think Clevertap currently does not have it (at least with my current knowledge).

The ability to highlight a specific section of the app (for example if we have new features in the app), would also be great.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
It gives us the ability to give targeted and automated engagement to our users, and it really helps us to increase the acquisition conversion rate and also to increase our retention rate. As it is very easy to use and can be done quickly, it can save a lot of time for us.

initial_reviews.review_title: A great tool to Increase User Engagement
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
1. Personalization & Automation, automatically drive specific marketing actions to each user through their past/current behavior or my custom lists.
2. Real-time tracking and available to run A/B tests, so I can monitor my campaign performance.
3. Clevertap AI feature (Intent-based segmentation) helps me specifically predict users with high uninstall rates so I can take appropriate actions to retain them.
4. Frequently receive good-fit solutions/guidelines from CleverTap's consultant based on my needs.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
CleverTap documentation is quite confusing, so I frequently needed assistance from the customer support team.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have different user segments with different levels of loyalty and behavior, CleverTap helps me identify these user segments and automate marketing campaigns to increase user engagement.

initial_reviews.review_title: Use it for all things marketing campaigns
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
- Personalize frequent experiences and automate campaigns across channels; we use it for all things marketing campaigns.
- Prevent user churn by detecting uninstalls.
- Target users outside of the dashboard, like website visitors.
- Comprehensive documentation for complex journeys and feature understanding.
- Interface is intuitive and easy to navigate
- Customer support is also good especially Sanjay Singh, if you're facing some issue related to WhatsApp or SMS, he will solve it with little to no time involvement from your side and it HELPS a lot. Anand Abhishek is your go-to person to sort out all things Clevertap issues on a day-to-day basis, is easy to talk with, and is very patient with our queries.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
- Some (not much) data mismatch when tallying with Mixpanel
- Too many simple errors that sometimes delay the execution
- Some hard times while creating complex journeys; not too straightforward to create logics and plan journeys, hence requiring extra efforts and steps.
- Doesn't show an accurate conversion rate as to whether the user has converted because of the particular campaign or they would have done it anyway.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
- Personalize frequent experiences and automate campaigns across channels; we use it for all things marketing campaigns.
- Build engagement and relationships with users and improve retention.

initial_reviews.review_title: Streamlining Customer Engagement with Precision
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
We are using Clevertap for past 1 year now and have used almost every major feature there is. Apart from it being easy to understand, as a marketer there are various other factors that I like which are involved, for example:
- Seamless Omnichannel Integration (Email, Push, SMS, In-App)
- Advanced Analytics and Insights (Flows, Cohorts, etc)
- Personalization at Scale (Behavioral segmentation, Journeys)
- AI-Powered Automation (Intent, RFM models)

All of the points from above plus a robust success team that is proactive in resolving any issue, makes using Clevertap a pleasant experience. They are approachable and give the best possible solution to any issue.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
There are other features that I would definitely like to be included as compared to what the competitors are providing:
- App Nudges
- Delaying option for In-App Messages for Web as well as Mobile
- Clear bifurcation app based vs web based events
- Data accuracy on CT Dashboard (as compared to our back-end)

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
It acts as a single dashboard for most of our Marketing and Analytics efforts. We don't use different tools to send/automate emails, push campaigns or to make customer journeys. It's all done here on Clevertap. As a CEM tool CT helped us in:
- understanding user engagement on the app
- creation of automated journeys
- best time to nudge the user
- bifurcation of our user segments based on RFM models
- A/B testing

Overall a must recommended option for Marketers!

initial_reviews.review_title: CleverTap for data and analytics (mobile app, webapp)
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
I had a positive onboarding experience by the CleverTap team. Special mention to Akshay Bhange who was the onboarding SPOC. He has a great understanding skill and technical knowledge. It made it easier for us to integrate CleverTap.

There are multiple data management options on CleverTap using which one can back up and import their data from CleverTap. If done properly, one will have their data intact and migrating becomes easier, if and when needed.

At the analytics front, I like the smart insights that the platform generates on it's own. It's really helpful to get quick insights and makes our life easier.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
There are few features in analytics that I would like to see. For example, one cannot filter a user's history in a time range corresponding to a certain event. There is a workaround but not an elegant one. Another being ability to split an event. One can filter it though. I am sure these features are in pipeline.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
CleverTap is helping to generate actionable insights for me. This makes my life easier and enables me to take quick decisions that will benefit my product.

initial_reviews.review_title: Navigating User Behaviour for Powerful Product Management
initial_reviews.review_content:

CleverTap serves as an invaluable tool for product managers, offering a user-friendly interface to delve into comprehensive analytics.

The platform's user engagement tools, including push notifications and personalized messaging campaigns, play a crucial role in establishing effective connections with our audience.

CleverTap's personalization features, such as user journey tracking and recommendation engines, contribute significantly to creating tailored user experiences.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
While CleverTap has no significant downsides, the continuous pursuit of improvement is always admirable. Areas such as product development, dashboard enhancements, and bug resolution, though not major concerns, present opportunities for further refinement. Given CleverTap's proactive approach, I'm confident these aspects are already on their development roadmap.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
CleverTap addresses critical challenges in user engagement, targeting, data analysis, and personalization, offering valuable insights into user behaviour, campaign performance, and conversion rates.
The platform's segmentation capabilities empower businesses to tailor messaging based on diverse criteria, contributing to increased user engagement, improved conversion rates, and enhanced user satisfaction.

all_reviews.review_title: The best engagement tool out there currently!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Have been using clevertap over 2 years now. Also, having used other engagement tools, I can rightly say that the UX and the ease of integration that Clevertap has with the number of features it offers is awesome! Wait, that's just not the good part. Starting from implementing Clevertap in my current company to post implementation support was phenomenol. As a product manager you'd want to have tools with you that helps your life, Clevertap does just that! Kudos to the clevertap team for building such great product!

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
I feel it can still enhance its AI capabilites even further, right now its a bit limited.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We need to send a lot of PNs, Email and texts notifcations to our customers after onbaording during certain step of the journey. For example, "if a customer is not converting from step A to step B within X amount of time then perform certain actions that nudegs Y% of customer to do certain actions" This is by far my majority of use case as a product manager.  This requires a lot of speed a quick building an implementation and sync between Mixpanel and Clevertap, it helps me acheive this way quicker than other engagement tools.

all_reviews.review_title: A vital tool for boosting user engagement and retention
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
I have been using CleverTap for over 5 years, and it has become the core of our Growth tools. With its multiple available channels, Journeys tool, Intent-Based Segments, and RFM analysis, CleverTap enables us to automate business rules to increase user retention, reactivate inactive users, streamline onboarding for new users, and build loyalty among our best customers.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
It remains a platform where heavy reliance on constant developer support is needed to fully leverage its potential. Additionally, it would be beneficial if they expanded the options for predefined templates for In-App banners more frequently.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
CleverTap has been the essential tool for executing our growth strategies, significantly improving activation, retention, and engagement. By leveraging CleverTap's analytics capabilities and automating business rules with Journeys, we have reduced churn during the registration process by 30% and increased activation rates by 50%.

all_reviews.review_title: Great solution for Marketers
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Clevertap is very easy to use for Marketers, only needed some initial setup which will be assisted by Clevertap team also.

We really like the Journey feature, where we can setup a predefined, targeted, and automated series of marketing campaigns using various channels such as Push Notifications, Email, and In-App Banner.

Some features such as RFM Segmentation can really help in giving engagement in a quick way to our most valuable users or the dormant potential users to be reactivated again.

The Customer Support is also superb, we have a bi-weekly session to check if we experience any difficulties or if Clevertap have any ideas on how to improve the campaigns. Every Quarter, Clevertap team would also give Quarterly review to improve the business.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
I have seen other similar solution have a Nudges/Spotlight feature that can highlight specific area of the app to the user, but I think Clevertap currently does not have it (at least with my current knowledge).

The ability to highlight a specific section of the app (for example if we have new features in the app), would also be great.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
It gives us the ability to give targeted and automated engagement to our users, and it really helps us to increase the acquisition conversion rate and also to increase our retention rate. As it is very easy to use and can be done quickly, it can save a lot of time for us.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
1. Personalization & Automation, automatically drive specific marketing actions to each user through their past/current behavior or my custom lists.
2. Real-time tracking and available to run A/B tests, so I can monitor my campaign performance.
3. Clevertap AI feature (Intent-based segmentation) helps me specifically predict users with high uninstall rates so I can take appropriate actions to retain them.

CleverTap documentation is quite confusing, so I frequently needed assistance from the customer support team.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have different user segments with different levels of loyalty and behavior, CleverTap helps me identify these user segments and automate marketing campaigns to increase user engagement.

all_reviews.review_title: Use it for all things marketing campaigns
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
- Personalize frequent experiences and automate campaigns across channels; we use it for all things marketing campaigns.
- Prevent user churn by detecting uninstalls.
- Target users outside of the dashboard, like website visitors.
- Comprehensive documentation for complex journeys and feature understanding.
- Interface is intuitive and easy to navigate
- Customer support is also good especially Sanjay Singh, if you're facing some issue related to WhatsApp or SMS, he will solve it with little to no time involvement from your side and it HELPS a lot. Anand Abhishek is your go-to person to sort out all things Clevertap issues on a day-to-day basis, is easy to talk with, and is very patient with our queries.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
- Some (not much) data mismatch when tallying with Mixpanel
- Too many simple errors that sometimes delay the execution
- Some hard times while creating complex journeys; not too straightforward to create logics and plan journeys, hence requiring extra efforts and steps.
- Doesn't show an accurate conversion rate as to whether the user has converted because of the particular campaign or they would have done it anyway.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
- Personalize frequent experiences and automate campaigns across channels; we use it for all things marketing campaigns.
- Build engagement and relationships with users and improve retention.

all_reviews.review_title: Streamlining Customer Engagement with Precision
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
We are using Clevertap for past 1 year now and have used almost every major feature there is. Apart from it being easy to understand, as a marketer there are various other factors that I like which are involved, for example:
- Seamless Omnichannel Integration (Email, Push, SMS, In-App)
- Advanced Analytics and Insights (Flows, Cohorts, etc)
- Personalization at Scale (Behavioral segmentation, Journeys)
- AI-Powered Automation (Intent, RFM models)

All of the points from above plus a robust success team that is proactive in resolving any issue, makes using Clevertap a pleasant experience. They are approachable and give the best possible solution to any issue.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
There are other features that I would definitely like to be included as compared to what the competitors are providing:
- App Nudges
- Delaying option for In-App Messages for Web as well as Mobile
- Clear bifurcation app based vs web based events
- Data accuracy on CT Dashboard (as compared to our back-end)

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
It acts as a single dashboard for most of our Marketing and Analytics efforts. We don't use different tools to send/automate emails, push campaigns or to make customer journeys. It's all done here on Clevertap. As a CEM tool CT helped us in:
- understanding user engagement on the app
- creation of automated journeys
- best time to nudge the user
- bifurcation of our user segments based on RFM models
- A/B testing

Overall a must recommended option for Marketers!

all_reviews.review_title: CleverTap for data and analytics (mobile app, webapp)
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
I had a positive onboarding experience by the CleverTap team. Special mention to Akshay Bhange who was the onboarding SPOC. He has a great understanding skill and technical knowledge. It made it easier for us to integrate CleverTap.

There are multiple data management options on CleverTap using which one can back up and import their data from CleverTap. If done properly, one will have their data intact and migrating becomes easier, if and when needed.

At the analytics front, I like the smart insights that the platform generates on it's own. It's really helpful to get quick insights and makes our life easier.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
There are few features in analytics that I would like to see. For example, one cannot filter a user's history in a time range corresponding to a certain event. There is a workaround but not an elegant one. Another being ability to split an event. One can filter it though. I am sure these features are in pipeline.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
CleverTap is helping to generate actionable insights for me. This makes my life easier and enables me to take quick decisions that will benefit my product.

all_reviews.review_title: CleverTap: A Powerful Engagement Engine with Robust Analytics
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
CleverTap is one of the best tools in the industry. Having used other leading tools, I can justify that CT has a lot of advanced features which helps us enchance our  user touchpoints.

Few things that I like about CT based on my experience:


- Easy to use with very less learning curve
- Library of preset templates for push & in-app notifications which serve for different purposes
- Ability to send multiple communications from a single campaign/node by splitting users based on their user property
- Real-time event tracking
- Unlike other tools, CT does a great job in the analytics section
- Based on the analytics, we are able to create custom user segments instantly and run A/B tests to measure conversion incrementality
- Journeys have a great feature called intelli-node which allows us to A/B test different journeys within a single journey and meausre the performance
- Very responsive customer support

Overall, CleverTap is a clear winner. If you're tired of surface-level insights, basic campaigns, and want to drive real engagement with automation on your side, this is your platform. Highly recommended!

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
- There is no option to duplicate nodes in a journey which takes extra time & effort
- Enhancing customization options in In-app campaigns (priotization, triggering on specific screens, timer delay)
- App uninstall tracking
- Exporting control group user data from campaigns & journeys is not available

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
CT is helping us activate, retain, and reactivate users on our platform. We firmly belive in constantly A/B testing and improving our efforts, and with CT, we are able to achieve that.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Clevertap is easy to use and navigating through the platform and accessing its features is relatively straightforward, which contributes to a smoother user experience.

We frequently utilise the platform to engage with our user base.CleverTap's user engagement tools, encompassing push notifications and personalized messaging campaigns, have been instrumental in establishing effective connections with our audience. The platform's ability to target specific user groups based on diverse criteria has proven highly effective, enabling us to gain valuable insights into user behaviour, campaign performance, and conversion rates.

The personalization features offered by CleverTap, notably user journey tracking and recommendation engines, have played a pivotal role in crafting tailored experiences for our users. We've experienced a seamless and positive interaction with their customer support team. They consistently display responsiveness and helpfulness whenever we encounter challenges or require assistance. Overall, our experience with CleverTap has been exceptionally rewarding, enhancing our ability to engage with users and optimize our marketing efforts.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
I have faced difficulties when it comes to searching for a particular user profile using a phone number. We rely on phone numbers as one of the key identifiers and need to access specific user profiles quickly and efficiently. The inability to search by phone number requires us to use alternative methods for user profile lookup, which can be less streamlined and efficient.

The platform supports multiple communication channels, including email, SMS, push notifications, and in-app messages.

ease of use for the end user with intuitive design

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
The customer 360 view is missing the engagement details. We cant see, what emails/pushes customer has recieved and opened or clicked on the customer profile itself. It needs to be searched through events.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Previously we had different tools for Push notifications and emails so our biggest challenge was to have automated journey which could use both elements. Clevertap having both features togethers makes it simple for us to use multi--channel journeys. Clevertap also comes with an in-built CDP which were needed to run campaign analytics for effectivity. Clevertap is easy to use from an end user prespective so there is no more dependancy on tech team to help with segments and setting up campaigns, market users are able to execute campaigns from start to finish. This helped us getting the IP warming done in a very fast and smooth process.

all_reviews.review_title: CleverTap: Elevating Our Marketing Game!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Easy to Use Interface: CleverTap's UI is simple to use and doesn't require much technical knowledge, which aids in the efficient execution of our campaigns.

Multichannel Connectivity: CleverTap offers multichannel support that enables us to reach out to users via a variety of channels, including as push notifications, SMS, and emails.

Customer service is excellent: I really appreciate the support team which is working with us. Whenever we are in need of help with any kind of difficulties they always there to help us out. They are always happy to answer all our questions.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Integration problems: It is difficult to link other products with CleverTap that we need to do our everyday tasks with your existing tech stack. Sometimes it requires more time to get past this obstacle.

Issues with Customization: I believe CleverTap has to work on tailoring their product to the requirements of the many industries they are dealing with because everyone has distinct problems that they are attempting to solve and a similar solution might not be effective for everyone.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Use-case for A/B Testing: CleverTap's A/B testing has assisted us in analyzing what is more effective for us, fine-tuning our content, and understanding the overall outcomes.

Use-case for Segmentation and Personalization: We were able to segment our user base based on a variety of characteristics and behaviors and target them with individualized communications thanks to CleverTap's strong and efficient segmentation capabilities. In terms of conversion rates and user engagement, this has been highly successful.

all_reviews.review_title: CleverTap - Smart Analytics, Smarter Engagement
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
The support team at CleverTap is highly dedicated and responsive. Ms. Swati and Mr. Mayuresh, in particular, have been of great support in providing invaluable assistance and addressing all our inquiries.

Omnichannel journey creation and tracking is almost effortless, allowing for a cohesive and coordinated experience across various touchpoints.

Campaign execution is straightforward, whether it's through push notifications, in-app messaging, or emails. It provides important data at a glance, and a wide variety of creative templates are available to enhance campaign effectiveness. Additionally, supporting campaigns in multiple languages makes it a versatile solution for us.

CleverTap's tracking capabilities are not only comprehensive but also user-friendly, making it easy to monitor and analyze user interactions and campaign performance.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Nothing to dislike, just a few things to have a look on:
An app version would be really appreciated if we have to edit things on the go.
There should be an auto-save feature while drafting emails.
Drafted campaigns should be editable (not stopped) even if the segment is deleted.
While creating segments, copy/pasting the data in becomes a hassle and freezes the system.
Some UI issues while scrolling when you have the drop down open in the campaign set up page.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
User Engagement
Data Analysis
Personalization
Multi-Language Support
Campaign Management & Omnichannel

CleverTap has been a great upgrade from our previous marketing tool. It has a lot of useful features for improving customer engagement. It has helped us create real-time journeys and make specific granular user segments. The real-time analytics and reports have also been great! The interface is very user-friendly, making the campaign setup intuitive and smooth.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
While CleverTap has great features, there is a learning curve in figuring the platform out and then using its features to the fullest.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
CleverTap has made user engagement a lot easier. Previously the systems we were using had a long latency for the data flowing in from multiple systems. Here, that has become a lot faster and seamless. Also, by having targeted campaigns and creating personalized journeys, we have had better user responses on Emails, SMS, and WhatsApp channels.

In short, CleverTap has played a key role in helping us create great user journeys and step up our marketing game.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Clevertap offers simple yet powerful suite of features which helps in understanding user journey across different stages. The segmentation capabilities are simply the best I have used so far.

Top 3 of my favourite features:

1. Ability to use large number of custom properties along with each event which makes the whole data tracking extremely useful.
2. Ability to build ad-hoc segments which help in understanding user behaviour.
3. Journey automation is a huge time saver. Journeys help in setting round the clock messaging to users based on the behaviour on app / web.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
I am fond of building dashboards and visualization. Clevertap offers limited capabilities in terms of visualization. Customization capabilities in graphs will be a great plus.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Clevertap is enabling the complete communication stack for us by allowing user segmentation and reaching those users through automated messaging via punsh notifications, in-app messaging, emailers etc.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent Tool for analysing  user base, best tool for Engage with your audience
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
There are multiple features that I like about CleverTap. Some of the prominent features are as follow:

1. Very Easy to use and analyze your audience based on Segments, Events, Funnels, Cohorts.
2. Customer journeys help you to automate engagement journeys.
3. Funnels are excellent. After analyzing our user funnel, we figured out exactly where our customers are dropping off. By making changes after analyzing funnels, we reduced our dropoff by more than 20 percent.
4. You can easily upload a custom user base and target them very quickly.
5. They have an excellent support team and resolve customer queries.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
One thing I don't like is you can't search a particular user profile with a Phone Number. Most apps have a phone number as the primary login method. Some of the apps even have a phone number as only registration method. On ClaverTap, we can search users either by ClaverTap ID, Email ID, and identity.

Overall It's a great tool, and I am using since two years, and they always come up with new feature and good changes.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have an Ed-Tech product, and CleverTap has helped us in user engagement; In-app is unique. We use them in multiple ways. It helped us in targeting our audience based on segments too.

We have seen significant growth in user activities on our Ed-Tech product after channelizing targeted journeys and In-apps. On top of that, funnels are very helpful, which help us to know where users are leaving my universe, and we did changes based on those fennels and reduced drop off.

Clavertap is amazing when it comes to cross-platform integrations and it's amazing to work with there team too.

all_reviews.review_title: The revolution in how you interact with customers: Omnichannel with data-driven way.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
1. Journey Builder facilitates easy, automated, and swift omnichannel communication for marketers.

2. Strong personalization capabilities.

3. Analytics helps marketers gain a comprehensive understanding of customer behavior.

4. Powerful data activation enables the creation of customer outreach campaigns anywhere.

5. Great support and documentation.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
1. Documentation on some features, such as Native Display and Bulletins is still vague and difficult for marketers to understand.

2. Encountering Unicode UTF-8 encoding errors during personalization.

3. Unable to send unique vouchers.

These are minor issues, but they are areas for improvement for CleverTap to enhance their product.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
CleverTap is a "coach" that helps us completely transform our way to engage and retain customers. All campaigns are personalized and automated based on seamless customer data.

Instead of relying on Developer teams to coordinate campaign execution, now, with CleverTap, marketers can proactively create individual campaigns or customer journeys using pre-built features.

Marketers gain the ability to approach and analyze customers accurately through each feature that CleverTap provides.

all_reviews.review_title: Stable and Reliable tool for User Engagement, Analytic and Campaign Management
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
The platform's stability is the best compared to the same platform, yet they also provide detailed features which help marketers simplify the campaign.
1. Analytics
I love how Clevertap helps users organize the campaign analytics with the pivot feature, which clearly shows the user how to navigate the improvement of the previous campaign.
2. Campaign variations
The campaign variations also help marketers to build the campaign more specific to specific segments. I also admire how the platform runs smoothly with segment estimation, which can help the marketer navigate the expectation from the campaign result.
3.RenderMax and Campaign optimization
The best feature of Clevertap, which can't be found in other marketing tools, is the RenderMax which can help the marketer to boost the impression of Chinese-manufactured phones.
4. Automated Journey Campaign
to run a campaign with smooth automation, Clevertap does its best with simple UI UX to create the user marketing journey along with sophisticated personalization features.

Overall, I would argue that Clevertap is the best marketing campaign platform with the best stability and data analysis; those two are the most important to any marketer.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
What I dislike about Clevertap are :
1. the delay in exporting the report from the campaign, and it takes more time if you are exporting multiple campaign reports at the same time
2. custom segmentation sometimes failed to crawl the data that had been uploaded
3. the bugs delay being informed to users; sometimes, the updated bugs on the features are delayed in being reported to users, and it affects the marketers to run campaigns that currently use the feature.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Simplifying all marketing processes from manual push notifications, automated marketing journey, user segmentation and analytics. Those features help the business do a minimum job of completing multiple marketing efforts with a single platform and minimum manpower to handle the overall process.

all_reviews.review_title: A very powerful and comprehensive tool for User Analytics & Engagement
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Clevertap is a platform that facilitates extensive communication and engagement flexibility alongside cognitive user behavioral insights. It allows us to micro-segment users using incredible features that encompass Intent-Based Segmentation, RFM, Funnel & Trend analysis that makes personalized engagement quite a few notches up. While the existing features only make it a great platform in itself, the new additions will allow us to engage users in fast-growing channels like Whatsapp, the introduction of intellinode makes A/B testing quite useful. One thing that sets Clevertap apart is their customer support team, especially Ajinkya. They are not only highly informed but are ever active in supporting and guiding us through not only new features but existing queries as well.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Although there are no significant concerns, there is always room for improvement in product development, dashboard stats or bugs, but I'm very sure they are way ahead and have it in their roadmap already.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
1. User Onboarding and Engagement - Clevertap allows us to identify and engage new customer based not only on their needs but identifies intricacies around their behavior which makes our life much simpler.
2. Omni-Channel Communication - We have majorly relied on CleverTap to communicate with the users and has been an excellent one stop solution for multiple media channels.
3. Personalization - The one thing that has benefitted no matter the intent, is the presence of powerful personalization (Dynamic variables, Linked Content, Conditional Clauses & Liquid Tags) that helps us get a step closed and connect personally with our users.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful marketing tool that has made our overall customer journey easier and efficient
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Onboarding - This stage is a critical aspect and we are happy to say that CleverTap has a great process to onboard customers and a team that puts customer's interests on top. This is especially true of a channel like Email, where correct warm-up can greatly enhance effectiveness. The onboarding team, expertly led by Amber, had a highly proactive approach with useful recommendations and timely interventions around multiple aspects, example - campaign volumes, domain health, etc. Regular meetings and status checks are conducted to ensure there is no slippage. We could complete the whole process in a very short time.

Product - Several useful features within Analytics, example- Funnels: which helps with easy and immediate access to the right segments to target. Other tools that help understand user behaviour based on demographics, open rates, click rates and best times for optimum open and click rates help in improving effectiveness.

Support - Appreciate the great support from our Success manager - Mrinal Deshmukh, who is very responsive and helps out on queries and issues in a timely manner.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
The functionality of getting a valid profile picture against the sender ID is something which can be integrated and looked upon for Email services.

Email delivery rates can be shown even for email which are currently missing which can be included.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
With CleverTap, we are able to reach users in real-time based on their actions, by using event-based targeting, thereby improving the conversion rates of the campaigns.

With the help of the dashboard, we have a richer understanding of the user's behaviour and the importance of factors such as geographic region, time of day, etc. Using these insights, we have been able to greatly improve upon the open rates of email campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: The best customer engagement & user retention software
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
1. Provides a data-backed engagement strategy to reduce customer dropoffs and increase the revenue function of our organization.
2. Smartest user retention tool to understand the length & breadth of our user cohort & help decide actionable insights to retain these cohorts.
3. Seamless user communication journey creation tool.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
1. The analytics features can be optimized to a great extent, such as funnel creation, user flows & basic cohort definitions.
2. Integration with other services such as Slack or Teams is not supported.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
With CleverTap, we are trying to solve two major business goals :
1. User Retention - We leverage CleverTap's extremely sophisticated engagement tool ( Journeys, Campaigns ) to make sure our users are well aware of our product offerings & features and expose our reward offerings basis the user segmentation tools offered by CleverTap.
2. Onboarding Journey - CleverTap helps us in targeting users during their onboarding journey with our platform and by doing so, we reduce the friction between end user and our platform which translates to an absolute reduction in drop-offs within the funnel.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to use and impactful marketing automation tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Ease of use: CleverTap is easy to use, even for those without experience with marketing automation platforms. The user interface is intuitive, and the documentation is comprehensive.

Features: CleverTap offers many features, including push notifications, in-app messaging, email marketing, user segmentation, and analytics. This makes it a powerful tool for businesses of all sizes.

Support: CleverTap offers excellent support. The customer support team is knowledgeable and responsive, and they are always willing to help.

Overall, I am very impressed with CleverTap. It is a powerful, easy-to-use, and affordable marketing automation platform that can help businesses of all sizes to improve their mobile marketing efforts.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Some features can be improved. For example, the dashboard feature is limited in terms of the number of pins that can be added to a board and the ability to edit pins. If we want to share charts and complete dashboard snapshots at once, it's not possible.

This slight improvement only, over and above, is a perfect tool.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
CleverTap is benefiting me in several ways. First, it is helping me to engage with my users in a more personalized and meaningful way. This results in higher engagement levels and improved retention rates. Second, CleverTap is helping me to convert my users into customers. This results in higher conversion rates and increased revenue. Finally, CleverTap is providing me with valuable insights into my users. This is helping me better understand their needs and preferences, allowing me to improve my marketing campaigns and the growth of my company.

all_reviews.review_title: Great marketing automation tool!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
We have used the journey feature which allows multiple channels and great segmentation extensively for user activations. We have seen really great results from this. The intent-based segmentation also helps us reach out to our dormant users and gives us the ability to set goals for certain timelines and track if we are achieving these goals.

The campaigns have been set up in a very easy format hence very easy to execute them.

I should definitely mention the great support team who has always been helpful in solving our issues and queries in a timely manner. Our customer success manager Mr. Sreeram has always been in touch with us and helped us improve our campaigns, journeys, and overall Clevertap experience to a great extent.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
There are a few UI changes that can be worked on, this has already been communicated to the Clevertap team and I have been informed they are working on this. Other than that few glitches sometimes like logging out of the dashboard sometimes I have noticed.

Other than these minor issues, no complaints so far.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using CleverTap for the following  -

1. Smooth onboarding flow and control drop-offs - we had noticed a lot of our users drop off during onboarding and there was a drop in new user activations hence we used CleverTap journeys to control these drop-offs and to let users know about our platform via various channels. This helped us to increase new user activations.

2. Dormant users - dormant users we consider users who haven't used our platform for more than a month (last 30 days). We are using CleverTap to nudge users using various channels to bring them back to our platform. This has helped us to increase our MAU very well.

all_reviews.review_title: Amazing One-Stop Solution for Marketing & Analytics
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Firstly, I think it is very intuitive and easy to learn. The analysis I can do is very in depth. Other than that, the support team is very helpful and gives prompt responses.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Some features are not well thought out when being designed. One small example can be of Dashboards where I can only add a maximum of 20 pins to a board and I can't edit any pin. If I want to change a pin, I have to delete it and re-do the analysis and then pin the analysis to my board. Another thing is that I can't add filters to my dashboards so it gets very tedious as I have to create multiple similar boards with different filters. Other than that, I find it weird that I can't create proper dashboards for the campaigns I run and I have very limited ability to export that data elsewhere in case I need to create dashboards somewhere else.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
It has helped us automate journeys for different segments such as new users and old churned users. It has also allowed us to set up a push notification and popup schedule which has really helped us automate work for the marketing department.

If I want to change a pin, I have to delete it and re-do the analysis and then pin the analysis to my board. Another thing is that I can't add filters to my dashboards so it gets very tedious as I have to create multiple similar boards with different filters. Other than that, I find it weird that I can't create proper dashboards for the campaigns I run and I have very limited ability to export that data elsewhere in case I need to create dashboards somewhere else.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
UI/UX is very intuitive and easy to navigate, learn, practice, and use for 1st time user and those who have not used this type of tool before
In-depth and sophisticated segmentation, as long as you can pass the necessary event and properties, you can segment it
Have a diverse format of in-app communication: noti, emails, in-app banners, pop up
Account Support is very active and willing to work with you to come up with a solution

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Does not have CSV or Excel campaign report export (fewer report types)

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Clevertap can push notifications to remind users to continue their journey when they drop off. This has helped us improve the conversion rate in our funnels
Besides that, Clevertap can help us engage more users on multi-channels, making sure we don't miss any users.

all_reviews.review_title: Good tool, with a lot of possibilities
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
- The bi-weekly meetings are useful to get everything out of CleverTap that fits within your strategy;
- Swift replies and support by the Customer Success team;
- The tool has a lot of possibilities & is great for testing out new things

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
- Reporting can be tricky and is not always obivous or clear
- Make sure to be 100% sure of what you want out of CT during the onboarding
- Your email templates are hard to access (only through the creation of a journey or campaign) and the editing of the templates is not easy going. Once you get the hang of it, it's fine, but could definitely be optimised

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
- Sending out emais and push notifications in one journey, without the use of your tech team
- Quickly trying out and using some personalised content with your users, without the use of your tech team
- Easily analysing the performance of your communications
- Analysing the behaviour of your customers and seeing where they drop off

all_reviews.review_title: Must-have tool to elevate your marketing strategies
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Clevertap is one of the most competitive automation tools for marketers. Its user-friendly interface, automation capabilities (intelli node), advanced analytics (trends, pivots, user flow etc), and omnichannel integration make it a game-changer. With Clevertap, we can create personalized campaigns, gain valuable insights, and deliver consistent messaging across multiple channels. It's a must-have tool to elevate your marketing strategies and achieve exceptional results. Varsha and Aayush helped onboard CT at Bukuwarung and are always there to resolve issues promptly.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
The pricing for CT is higher than the competition in the market. Other tools have started to catch up with comprehensive analytics and engagement features which can lead to the shift to other tools. AI is one way you can keep the edge over others.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
With CT we can reach out to our customers basis the channel they are reachable on. We can optimize our drop funnels and cross-adoption campaigns. IAB has helped us increase our engagement, and it also helped in sending personalized information based on the categories we aim to cater.

all_reviews.review_title: CleverTap: A Powerful Marketing Tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
One of the standout features of CleverTap that I genuinely appreciate is its exceptional support team. Their support team has been incredibly responsive and helpful whenever we've encountered an issue or had a question. They consistently go above and beyond to address our concerns promptly and effectively.

Another aspect that I find impressive about CleverTap is its extensive range of integrations. As a user, it's crucial for me to seamlessly connect different tools and platforms to enhance my marketing and customer engagement efforts. CleverTap offers an impressive array of integrations, allowing me to effortlessly consolidate data from various sources and leverage it to deliver personalised and targeted campaigns.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
CleverTap offers a wide range of features and functionalities, which can lead to a steep learning curve for users who are new to the platform. While there are documentation and resources available, a more comprehensive onboarding process or interactive tutorials could help users get up to speed faster and make the most out of CleverTap's capabilities.

The user interface of CleverTap can be overwhelming, especially for new users. Navigating through the various features and settings can sometimes feel cumbersome and unintuitive. Simplifying the interface and improving the user experience would greatly enhance the platform's usability.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
It tackles the issue of fragmented data by consolidating information from multiple sources into a unified platform, providing a comprehensive view of customer behaviour and preferences. This empowers us to make data-driven decisions and refine our marketing strategies for optimal results.

The seamless integration with multiple marketing channels facilitates consistent omnichannel communication, while robust behavioural analytics and automation features streamline workflows and enhance customer engagement. With CleverTap, we gain a competitive edge by leveraging comprehensive data insights and delivering personalised experiences to drive conversions and maximise our impact.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Engagement tool!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Clevertap is an exceptional tool that effectively boosts user retention while providing insightful analysis of trends and behaviors.

Sanae has been an invaluable support, consistently assisting us not only during our weekly meetings but also outside of them. She has played a crucial role in helping us comprehend the details of campaigns and journeys setups, as well as the associated statistics across various channels. Her expertise has simplified what initially appeared to be complex terminologies, always offering relevant documentation to address any concerns we encountered.

The documentation available for campaigns, journeys, and reports is truly impressive. It has proven to be an invaluable resource, providing comprehensive and clear guidance throughout our usage of the platform.

Thanks to the training sessions, we have witnessed incremental improvements on a weekly basis. This constant progress has fueled our enthusiasm to further explore and expand our knowledge of this remarkable software with each passing week.

Clevertap consistently undergoes updates, and it is evident that the team values user feedback and takes prompt action based on those experiences.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
When it comes to the fundamentals course in Clevertap's academy, the questions primarily focus on theoretical aspects. This approach can pose a challenge for individuals who possess practical experience with Clevertap, as they may struggle with answering queries related to definitions and specific numbers that hold little significance in real-world application.

One noteworthy drawback is that even if a question presents seven answer options, with four of them being correct, if a user selects three out of the four correct answers, they still receive a zero score. This evaluation method seems rather strict and does not adequately reflect the user's understanding of the subject matter.

Considering that Clevertap is centered around engagement and retention in practical scenarios, I strongly believe that incorporating case studies into the courses would greatly enhance users' critical thinking abilities. Real-world scenarios present complex challenges that require thoughtful analysis and decision-making, which can be effectively cultivated through case studies.

While I cannot ascertain whether case studies are included in other Clevertap courses, as I have only experienced the fundamentals course, I personally feel that their inclusion would be highly beneficial. This suggestion is based on my opinion and the belief that case studies offer a more comprehensive and insightful approach to learning and applying Clevertap's features.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Knowing what specific segments want and accordingly offering them what they likely want

all_reviews.review_title: Retention 360 - One Solution
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Ease of Campaign Creation.
Omnichannel Approach & Ease of Integration
Detailed Analytics & Insights
User Attribute Mapping
Integrating Webhooks, APIs driven campaigns multiple other solution for each use case
Personalization & Real time event based campaigns.
Creating audiences for FB/Google and integrate via CleverTap only

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Day on Day Reporting seems to be one of the drawbacks.
Journey based campaign performance cannot be gauged on a daily basis or so.
Limitation in terms of Push templates & InApp templates

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
For a Retention Marketing strategy it is very essential to reach out to the customer from one single platform to avoid any overlap of channels and further ensure that the right set of audience is engaged with a right communication channel.
We were able to create multiple journeys right from Welcome to Cart Abandon & all via all the touch points that a user might be engaging with.
Better Segmentation basis intent/browsing behavior and better targeting with real time updates on best time to engage/convert

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
The easiness of use, the essential features such as Funnel analysis, Cohort analysis, finding segments, and ad-hoc campaigns. On top of it, it's also relatively easy to integrate with our internal software.

The new UI upgrade on the campaign creation really helps me to plan and create multiple campaigns in a more seamless way than before, thus saving my time significantly.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Being unable to export user-level data after engagement, Product Experience feature is still unreliable as well with its user qualification which I would like to see the improvements from

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Activation and Retention problems, creating automatic treatments to hit certain segments of our users which lead us to become more productive while more efficient with our time

all_reviews.review_title: Best platform for marketing automation
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
It's easy to use, has all the required channels of engagement like email, SMS, in-app messaging, push (with great templates) and the fantastic WhatsApp capability with automatic responses. The journey builder for marketing also helps our team save a lot of time.

Their analytics provide us full insight into what our customers are doing on the app with their funnels, cohorts, flows (sunburst chart), pivots, real time dashboards, and are super fast.

The segmentation is also great and it's easy to set up campaigns on segments.

They also integrate well with our internal tools and other platforms like Branch and Segment.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Further UX optimisation would be good for a sleek experience.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
CleverTap is great as one single platform for both analytics and engagement. The dashboard works really fast, and campaigns go out in real time. I'm enjoying using the platform so far.

We got a nice onboarding to their platform and the support team is also quite responsive.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Clevertap is very quick, smooth and efficient with its data. It also helps in analysing the information on a realtime basis. Journeys can be mapped very quickly and also has a lot of affiliate partners to integrate smoothly,

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
It's costly and has some servicing-related issues, also the TAT for the resolution is more than 24-48 hours of time to companies which are small start-ups. Apart form that Clevertap is a leader in the market.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Clevertap is solving the below problems that are based on real-time data.
Quick data analysis, reach to the past audience with a 1-year data base, instant output as the data is stored on the cloud. It benefitted us with the customer understanding and journey mapping to each of the users.

all_reviews.review_title: One of the best tools in the market

2. Customer Support - they are really quick in helping with the resolution.
3. Data Analytics

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
1. Prioritization feature is missing.
2. Journeys could adopt more features like on-the-fly changes to campaign entry

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
CleverTap provided multi-channel communication with users, thus helping us build one journey that can utilize PN, Email, SMS, and/or WhatsApp within the same journey. Apart from this reaching users via various channels (especially Push Notification) to communicate with users at different stages of customer lifecycle.

all_reviews.review_title: Clevertap Usage review
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
We have been using Clevertap for the past 3 years as our omnichannel communication as well as a data analytics tool. The platform is user-friendly and offers a wide range of features that have helped me better understand and engage with my customers. The real-time analytics and insights provided by CleverTap has helped us make data-driven decisions about how to grow, engage & retain users in our app. The customer support team is also top-notch and always available to answer any questions I have. Overall, I am extremely satisfied with CleverTap and would highly recommend it to others.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
There are many areas for improvement and to be added feature that could help us make more user-focused campaigns or journeys in with better personalization features which it lack in some use cases.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
- customer engagement
- customer retention
- data analysis, viewing, presentation

It has helped on improving customer engagement, increase customer retention, and analyze data without coding on database by providing the tools and insights needed to better understand and connect with end customers.

review_question_answers.answer: We have been using Clevertap for the past 3 years as our omnichannel communication as well as a data analytics tool. The platform is user-friendly and offers a wide range of features that have helped me better understand and engage with my customers. The real-time analytics and insights provided by CleverTap has helped us make data-driven decisions about how to grow, engage & retain users in our app. The customer support team is also top-notch and always available to answer any questions I have. Overall, I am extremely satisfied with CleverTap and would highly recommend it to others.

review_question_answers.answer: There are many areas for improvement and to be added feature that could help us make more user-focused campaigns or journeys in with better personalization features which it lack in some use cases.

- customer engagement

- data analysis, viewing, presentation

all_reviews.review_title: Marketing automation tool with top of the class analytics capabilities
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
The best thing about Clevertap is although you are paying for a marketing automation tool, you get an excellent product analytics tool out of the box, which is at par with the best-in-class product analytics tools like Mixpanel, etc. It helps you automate SMS, emails, In-app messages, pop-up messages, etc, based on customer journeys and at various touch points in your application. You can quickly check the ROI and efficiency of these marketing campaigns that you run or just create some A/B test to see which campaigns truly deliver your ideas.  You can also analyse how customers are interacting with your application and take marketing decision based on that.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
It has a bit of a learning curve. Analytics can sometimes become a pain to understand and interpret, especially funnels, because, unlike Mixpanel, you cannot set how you want to count your conversion in Clevertap. It is fixed to measure unique conversions only. Secondly, the interface isn't intuitive and can be extremely slow sometimes. The user search capabilities are one specific feature that I dislike about Clevertap because I cannot search my users from their phone numbers. I have to convert the phone number to either email or identity and then search for users from that, which can be cumbersome.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Clevertap is a marketing automation tool that helps you connect with your customers by interacting with them through emails, SMS, push notifications, in-app messages, etc. This is highly beneficial and helps you run marketing campaigns that your tech team would otherwise have to build.  Clevertap has been a life saver to run marketing campaigns on a daily basis and to analyze their impact and gauge our ROI

You can quickly check the ROI and efficiency of these marketing campaigns that you run or just create some A/B test to see which campaigns truly deliver your ideas.  You can also analyse how customers are interacting with your application and take marketing decision based on that.

all_reviews.review_title: Clevertap to talk to your users
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Multiple channels available to reach your customer for example : SMS, email, In app notification, push notification, etc and multiple ways to identify where in the journey are they. You can create segments automatically from people who have dropped off the funnel or out of people who has triggered a particular event or trigger engagements based on real time activities of the user. We once used clevertap to communicate an error to a customer on a button click since our app did not have backward compatibility. We created a campaign with real time trigger on an event and sent an in app notification to user. it worked liked charm and felt like native error handling. It was beautiful.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
The thing that I hate the most about Clevertap is it's UI/UX. This is very ironical given that clevertap is a customer engagement tool and yet it itself fails at customer engagement. You cannot filter out the events triggered by a specific user properly. Creating campaigns is always a nerve wrecking process because there are so many options and you always feel you might be doing something wrong. They upgraded to a newer UI but I did not find that good either. I have used braze, mixpanel and clevertap has the most complicated UI

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Clevertap is a marketing automation tool that provides you the ability to contact your customers through various marketing channels like SMS, push notifications, in app messages, emails etc through out their journey with your app. It helps us immensely to reach out to our customers during various points in their journey while using our app. We send promotional and transactional messages and run marketing campaigns almost every day to bring users back to our platform. Clevertap has been extremely helpful in customer retention to us

all_reviews.review_title: Great experience with detailed customer journey analytics and multiple reengagement channels
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Clevertap offers detailed analytics about our user's journey on the app, its AI  helps us boost our recommendation engine by recommending related content based on user's past interactions or choices. We majorly use Clevertap for sending out push notifications to our users and measuring the impact of various paid marketing campaigns and channels. With custom dashboards, funnels, user cohorts and segments, their recency and frequency on the app helps us better understand their behaviour and ship product features accordingly.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Clevertap is much more expensive than its competitors and with an increasing userbase, we were finding it even heavier on the pockets therefore we moved to another Customer engagement platform.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
Clevertap charges us based on MAUs and most of the time these numbers are not accurately calculated, please do not consider Clevertap if you have a huge number of users who are bound to increase with time.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We used Clevertap for all the use cases it offered including sending a push notification, customer journey mapping and analytics, and creating exhaustive user onboarding flows which included event-based notification triggers. Clevertap has helped us in keeping our users engaged by observing their patterns of drop-offs at certain events and personalising notifications at these steps.

all_reviews.review_title: Amazing tool to reengage and retain customers
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
The analytics of Clevertap is better than that of MoEngage, although they both charges on the notifications delivered or MAUs. It gives us insights into a user's behavior on our app, and on analyzing their funnel, we know where they are spending the most time. This analytics helps us in building features for our users and using them in our marketing copies too.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
As our active user base is increasing so is the pricing of Clevertap. No doubts it is an expensive tool.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
Clevertap is an excellent tool to engage users and prevent churn and user drop-off. It reminds users what they are missing out on

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use it to reengage and retain customers and push them to buy products. Getting card abandoners to buy is achievable through push notifications. With Clevertap we can trigger automated personalized notifications depending on the user behavior and journey in the app. The analytics of experimental campaigns gives us a clear understanding of what imagery or messaging resonates with our users. These learnings and insights help us to prevent churn and increase user engagement.

all_reviews.review_title: Great tool for User Engagement
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
The best part is the Push templates offered by clever tap; it has almost 25% greater CTRs as it helped us differentiate on the Notification lock screen and cut the clatter. Designing user journeys and segmentation based on user behavior and activity on the app helped us identify gaps and nudge users to perform specific intended in-app actions through FOMO or personalized messaging. The best part is the flexibility to do A/B testing among test and control cohorts, easily without coding. Clevertap is an excellent tool for Activation, Retention, Rengagement, and Resurrection.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Updating user profiles is unbearably slow. It always keeps suggesting us to do an upgrade and also their ways to identify uninstallers doesn't seem to be very accurate.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
Clevertap can be a bit expensive for small startups which don't have access to huge funds.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a Growth Manager, I use CleverTap to enhance our end funnel conversion rates using push notifications, in-app notifications (interstitial and others) and promotional notifications. We also used Clevertap to nudge users to give our app a rating on google play store, and performed a lot of experiments on the best way to do so and CleverTap has helped a great deal in doing so.
