all_reviews.review_title: Great tool to optimize customer engagement journey.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Clevertap is the most convenient and insight-led user engagement platform. Creating custom segments and managing huge volumes is super quick and efficient as the system is robust enough to handle multiple queries and huge datasets at once. Using smart trigger campaigns, we were able to nudge users at various steps in their user journey and retain them while also inculcating them in a habit-forming journey. Their email suite helped us to consolidate all user attributes in one place and target them with effective email newsletters.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Apart from being expensive, there were no major issues with Clevertap.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
Clevertap is a great product which offers best-in-class features and services that help in retaining/engaging our userbase most sensibly.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
With Clevertap, we had better visibility of conversion events and other in-app events which garnered better results, therefore we were able to redirect all our efforts towards this. It also aids in analysing multi-channel campaign performance and not only engagement campaigns. Creating user segments and doing in-depth cohort analysis helps us to decide the most favourable factors while setting notification campaigns. It let us AB test between various coupons and incentives and helped us identify a balance between coupon and brand sustainability.

all_reviews.review_title: Comprehensive Customer Retention Platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
A single platform that assists the marketers to retain and engage their customers by helping build pathways to delight the customer at every touchpoint using a multi-channel approach. Its marketing automation intelligence helps us target customers when the intention of completing a goal (Purchase, filling a lead form, etc.) is relatively high. Omnichannel capabilities ensure that the customers are surrounded by brand communication but not bombarded by it to maintain the end user's interest.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
More technical, hence, not very convenient for a marketer with limited technical knowledge. Integrations in my experience are rigid. Takes quite a lot of time in understanding the platform end to end.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
If customer remarketing and engagement is your marketing concern, then think no more. CleverTap is all for you. But ensure that integration is done properly and a thorough understanding of the platform and its uses is given by the experts at CleverTap.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Reaching out to customers at the right time using multi-channel targeting (SMS, WhatsApp, Email, Push Notifications, etc.) has not only helped us encourage customer engagement but also gain back >6 months old customers with a personalized message. Our remarketing spends on paid media channels have been reduced by more than 60% since the use of CleverTap.

Ex. i can download data of users who clicked any campaign but can download time at which they clicked, in summary can't download events data, a big downside of CVT. If two users of CVT want to download data at same time, they cannot, requests runs in queue and another person have to wait until first persons' request is processed, at least 2 requests should be made run at a time.

all_reviews.review_title: Not very useful tool. Slow and expensive
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
The ease of creating funnels and segmentation is what I like about CleverTap. On a daily basis, we use segmentation to send out notifications to our users. This is a nifty feature.
We like the feature that clevertap can provide push amplification to the notifications which means it will retry sending a notification multiple times if it fails to render on the user's app in the frst attempt.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
The tool is very slow. Some internal Clevertap events can sometimes only be used under specific charts like Push impressions event is only available in Events chart and not in trends chart. It is IMPOSSIBLE to edit a saved chart or review if the chart was created correctly. The only way to save a chart is to create a dashboard and you cannot edit it at all except for the date range. This is a basic need and every tool should have it. Amplitude does a fantastic job at this and clevertap should take a few pointers from their playbook.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
This is a very slow tool. Please review all options before considering as it is quite expensive. Not recommended for a sandhill startup.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Clevertap mainly for notifications. These are used to drive our DAUs as well as in helping users understand the app. We also use it to make users do specific actions in the app to drive awareness and educate them.
The sun spread funnels chart gives us a quick
We also use Clevertap for tracking daily login funnels and creating funnels of activity via notifications.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
We majorly use Clevertap for sending push notification and the best part is that we can schedule these notifications for anytime, this automation helps during holidays. Clevertap provides us with a lot of controls like demographic/geographic targeting, this helps during A/B testing and double down on quality initiatives.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Their pricing model is based upon the number of notifications delivered, and these numbers are vastly inflated. Also they have too many options for reporting which sometimes gets confusing.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
It is a perfect turn for all your retention/resurrection needs. The product is designed beautifully and the support team responds quickly in case of any hiccups along the way.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Clevertap to design user journeys and analytics associated with events. We can see the whole user journey and identify the drop-offs and therefore can fix these gaps and prevent churn.Carefully analysing use behaviour helps us improve the product and craft better onboarding journeys to keep the user engaged. all_reviews.review_title: Probably the best (if not one of the best) customer engagement marketing platform in the market
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
The amount of channels that you can use to reach your customers with marketing campaigns is truly amazing! There's definitely a channel for every business out there and I like how you can create segments in clevertap and export them directly into Facebook/google ads as remarketing audiences. They have pretty nice analytics which you can use to complement your existing analytics platform such as Google Analytics and you can easily create dashboards according to your business needs. I also like the journeys feature which allows us to create multistep journeys to reach out customer in different stages. Lastly, their customer support is really good and it seems like help is always nearby, thanks guys!

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
You'll love this platform if your business revolves heavily around your mobile app to generate leads for your business. However, if you're planning to use CleverTap for web integration, please note that there are no landing page builders and no native forms that you can implement on your website. As there is no direct integration with forms, manual workarounds need to be done to capture and send form data and update your user profiles in CleverTap database. Email functionality can be improved, e.g. give user rights to bulk import HTML templates, save and overwrite existing templates etc.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
CleverTap is helping us identify customers and their journeys as a single profile instead of seeing them as multiple different sessions and cookies. This helps us create better data-driven campaigns and reach out to our customers at the right place and the right time.

all_reviews.review_title: Great tool now we can accionate individual customers
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
We can have very close control of every user on a single basis, and automate our marketing strategies to each one of them and with very controlled segments. The journeys allow us to do multiple automations actions based on each customer navigation and purchasing habits.

We have multiple options for campaigns, as sms, push, in app, and a lot of variances of push notifications, with images, and many other options.

We like we can track realtime usage of the app or past behaviour, so then we can make automations to increase our conversion rates and registration rates. Now we have a very close look on registration process so we can fix problems that were hurting our b2b registration process.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
After the integration with all of our platforms we were able to work with out any problem. It may requiere an intermediate level of tech development to implemented correctly to take advantage of its features.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
Take a close look on the integrations, so you will have good data to do segmentation for each customer according to their navigation. Its also important to track all yoour properties so you have a rich customer profile.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We anted to have a close look of our customers behaviour so we could accionate individual KPIs of our company. After we integrated everything we were able to see very detailed usage of our apps, what they bought, what they visit and didnt bought, etc. So now we are automating this behaviours to increase their spend GMV.

all_reviews.review_title: Great tool to engage your users!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
I have been using CleverTap for more than 3 years. I have to say that CleverTap has made a significant contribution to increasing app engagement and conversion rate from free to paid users and decreasing churn rate. The user action based campagins make it very easy to communicate to your users in reatime. We have a fairly large user base, and sometimes we need to send a message out to the entire base. CleverTap could handle the load easily. It's a reliable service that you can count on. We've also integrated CleverTap with RevenueCat so that CleverTap can automatically receive all the subscription events from RevenueCat. Depending on the type of the events, we then send different messages to our users to encourage them to stay with their subscriptions.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
- The documentation isn't good enough. It's a bit hard to find what you really need. I had to send a lot of queries to their customer support.  Fortunately, the customer support has been very responsive and helpful.
- The website is a bit slow. It sometimes takes a few seconds to load a page.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Increase app engagement. Users are spending more time in the app.

Functionalities for retention such as analytics and cohorts
Notifications Tools such as Push, SMS all integrated

What do you dislike about CleverTap?

all_reviews.review_title: The best engagement tool to have
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Easy to set up the campaigns and journey for your app. You can manage your In-app notification, Email, SMS, and push notification all in one single platform.
Also, the analytics part is easy to use and read.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
The liquid tags may not work at times which could be quite disappointing. Also, the campaign wise data is only available via email and not readily available on the dashboard.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
It's the best tool to use if you are considering retention of app users, easy to set up and manage.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Retention of app users along with other communications to users via different channels like email, SMS, etc.

Having Used other Marketing Automation tools earlier, what Clevertap brings to the table is something beyond usual. Right from Integration to usage, the interface brings great value

There are few challenges with respect to Events and container storage and their estimates. Journey builder is easy but at times confusing, takes a lot to make the team understand to use clevertap to its optimum level. API delivery and SDK updates could have been smoother, ideally a process which ensures product side integrations with ease can be a win win

Engagement - We could almost double our engagements with Clevertap through its Omnichannel capabilities

all_reviews.review_title: One stop MarTech solution!

Omni-channel engagement models, performance and analytics around push notifications, prompt and dedicated support.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Dependence on developers for regular updates and integrations. Journeys not serving a couple of edge cases. Unclear communication in certain actions that requires industry-wide standardization.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Product growth initiatives and analytics are being tackled using Clevertap, the benefits of using Clevertap are many but to state a few: it is a state of the art product and has been well-thought of which being developed, the measures for communication delivery are amazing thus ensuring best delivery rates in the market, easy to integrate with other SaaS products and tools, great work on the UI/UX front making the usability and adoption easy.

all_reviews.review_title: Clevertap helps with iterative granular product observations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Being able to track custom events and user journies. Through its campaigns, clevertap allows targeting customers sharply based on the behaviours and characteristics they exhibit.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
There's a fair bit of learning curve to get familiar with how the tool works. More assistance at the point of confusion within the app would be helpful so people can engage with the tutorial without having to break out of the flow. It would be helpful if attribution data were also made available within clevertap.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're still fairly new to clevertap. Our goal is to understand customer behaviour and accordingly make incremental improvements to our product. Some of the initial questions I'm keen about are what things are people engaging with? And then run A/B experiments.

all_reviews.review_title: A lot more than CRM
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Engaging customers using journeys (programmable chains of communications)
True omnichannel communication
Powerful analytics tools
The speed of processing data
Easy to share access to specific charts and graphs with people outside the retention team using Boards
Our success manager is accommodating and professional
The support team is doing well too

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Work with templates - there is no separate section, only inside campaigns/journeys
Uploading images - one would have to create a campaign to upload an image to the server
Intermediate past behavior nodes (journeys) only qualify users once a day at midnight; you can't change the time manually (entry nodes work fine)

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
CleverTap is used mainly by the retention team and works perfectly as an all-in-one tool. It is suitable for:

- collecting & analyzing data
- sending engagements (emails, push notifications, SMS) based on users' past behavior
- triggered communications
- assessing campaigns' and journeys' performance
- product analytics

all_reviews.review_title: CleverTap - An intelligent omnichannel engagement platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
CleverTap is a customer engagement and retention platform that provides the functionality to integrate app analytics and marketing. The platform helps customers increase user engagement in three ways:

- Tracks actions users are taking and analyzes how people use the product. It measures every action done by the user to help with directions taken by the user while navigating through the App, helps find specific issues faced.

- Segment users based on their actions and run targeted campaigns to these segments. These help us leverage the insights in better conversion.

- Analyze each campaign to understand its effect on user engagement and business metrics.

- The platform is scalable and supports a massive traffic load, analytics on the same, as well as real-time engagement with the base.

One of the best tools available for engagement with the user base, while maintaining user-level insights.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
1. The support team availability is commendable however the replies could be a little more query-specific and a little less generic.

2. Product-specific unexpected behaviors take too long to confirm with no short-term resolutions in most cases.

3. Documentation could really be more extensive.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
While other companies have either analytics or engagement, CT works at both level:

Audience analytics for tracking behavior and trends, and Omnichannel engagement ways that can allow you to convert your insights into communication, further into user actions and interactions.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Problem: Analysing and Engaging with the user base
CT as a solution: It maintains a user-level data that helps us identify insights for a segment or even for a specific user as per their history. So edge cases are detected in analysing. Boards assemble important day on day data. Campaigns help reach users, are highly customisable as per the use case.

all_reviews.review_title: Hidden Bills, Very poor support, they are big company don't care startups.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Clean UI, Lot of commitments, Fancy reports which you have to pay extra addons

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
1. Hidden fees, I was subscribed to a startup plan which they promise for free for a year but just because I was not part of their investor circle they gave me 7000 Rs.
2. It took us 1 month to figure out how to set up proper events and get meaningful reports, there is no support, all the replies to tickets after 12 hours.
3. We reported this is taking spam traffic, they claimed it's working well and billed us 32,000 which is 5X of my subscription.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
I was looking full-stack marketing solution that could work end to end with my product.

I don't like the new way to send reports, I feel so confused but right now is ok and sometimes download segments its slow, also that I can't see all the campaigns sent by type and results in the month, for example that I got a chart like in datastudio that tells me this month was impacted with 15 email campaigns and of those had 220,000 shipments and engagement 3,000, this information appear one by one in journeys and campaigns but this funnel does no exist.

all_reviews.review_title: CleverTap Service Review
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
The platform and dashboard is very feature rich and CleverTap continues to make product updates every quarter including ones that we have requested.

The Customer Success Team is very responsive and the CleverTap leadership team is very customer oriented. They listen to our needs and are very amenable to the support we need.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
No qualms or dislikes at this time. CleverTap has been a very strong strategic partner to StatementGames from the very beginning of our relationship.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
Get intimate with their product set through demos and discussions and really compare them with the other alternatives you are reviewing.  Ask a lot of questions to the Sales Account and Customer Success Teams about their products, services, Methods and Procedures, Product Roadmap, and support processes.  Take a look at their customer lists and ask them for information about how they have successfully used the products, use cases, and information that they are allowed to share.

Don't be afraid to ask them how they differentiate themselves from their competitors and what they have in the near term and future term product roadmap.  And get familiar with their integration process (APIs and SDKs) prior to making a final decision.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
With their help, StatementGames has been able to develop and launch a very strong omni-channel 360 marketing platform that not only keeps our subscribers engaged but allows us to develop a journey and relationship with our subscribers.

all_reviews.review_title: Solid Service for Customer Engagement
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
We use CleverTap for all push notifications as well as campaign-based email messaging to support customer engagement and retention. In general, we find it to be a solid service for our fairly standard needs. One of the things we like most about CleverTap is their responsiveness to issues and feature requests. Our account rep has been super helpful since day one. Additionally, it's good to see the evolution of the product over time-- it's clear to us that they've put quite a bit of money from their most recent fundraise toward product development. While we've only scratched the surface of the product in terms of the depth of features, it's nice to know that they continue to add more complex and feature-rich developments to it.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
* There is a bit of a learning curve in getting familiar with the tool
* Would be nice if they supported nested json in the event payload and user profiles within the tool
* Integration with Segment could be better documented

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use CleverTap to support user engagement and retention via targeted push notification and email campaigns. It has led to increased retention, active user counts and overall better user experience for our end users.

all_reviews.review_title: Fantastic tool and responsive customer support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
We previously lacked any ability to automate user communication.  What has been most valuable with Clevertap is the ability to trigger specific communications based on user actions in the app and watch the data roll in.  It is continuously informing our engagement and product initiatives.  The tool is more robust than we have the resources to currently master.  That's a good thing.  I can only imagine the results will get better and better.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Our catalog is massive and the amount of metadata to power individualized communication is not conducive to manual campaign set up.  I do wish Clevertap's had a more out of the box ability to address some of the mass personalized communication challenges we have, but they are working diligently with us to solve our issues with I appreciate.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Onboarding is a challenge.  That includes getting a user from install to sign up, and then from sign up to X number of downloads complete (our magic moment at which users start to retain much better).  We have benefited most in improving the latter.

all_reviews.review_title: Reach Your Goals with CleverTap-Multichannel Marketing Platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
CleverTap allows us to message our customers on multiple channels, including reaching them on all active devices they're logged into. The Journeys feature allows for multi-messsage & multi-channel campaigns, all triggered by user behavior. Built-in analytics capabilities reduce the risk of data loss--data is no longer siloed. Creating user segments is simple and straightforward. Campaign creation is intuitive. The CleverTap team is extremely communicative. The support team is quick to respond, and handle all our issues and questions in a lightning-fast manner. The price for CleverTap is very competitive, especially given its robust capabilities.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
There are some UI issues that make the platform buggy--the inability to save filtering options when toggling from a result back to the full results list. We are unable to set a campaign to launch at a particular time, THEN go out to users at the best time for them. Segmentation is somewhat limited--can't segment by "this" AND "this" OR "this"; when choosing a saved segment, it parses the criteria out individually again, instead of keeping the initial segmentation criteria, then allowing for additional queries to be added on top. (Other platforms allow for this.)

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're using CleverTap to send onboarding/new user messaging, engagement & retention campaigns, as well as user-to-user triggered Journeys. We've seen an increase in onboarding/account completion after launching a Journey aimed at Android users who install but don't complete account. Analytics and reporting capabilities are somewhat limited; unable to create metrics reports that compare more than one event, or parsed by specific user properties.

all_reviews.review_title: CleverTap - easy tracking & versatile channel communication
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
The segmentation feature is quite robust. Conditions and filters are easy to understand and make use of.
Clevertap also provides good amount of custom configurations in notifications, some of them works really well for ecommerce. Plus, their off the shelf recommendation system that we could use in our notification helped us achieve good number of extra orders.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Product Analytics was pretty basic when we first started using clevertap. Very recently, they have started adding capabilities for cohort comparisons, averages, %active for events. Looks like they are trying to make up for what's missing on this front fast. They can invest more effort on adding querying capabilities within the tool.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
You can consider it if you need easy to use marketing communication tools, segmentation and journeys. For more deep dived product analytics, it's still picking up.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using features like flows, segmentations to understand what actions our first time users are doing after launching the app. This helps us figure out how we can shape the onboarding experience and take more users beyond the activation stage.

Funnels and Trends are looked at almost daily to ensure our quality metric isn't compromised. We split by acquisition sources to see if there are hiccups.

Finally, it's easy to just send communication to any segment, one time or recurring or just create a journey. So, that's what we do once we know intent of different segments of users.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful platform for mobile user engagement
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
It's a no-brainer to have this tool if you are a marketer especially if you focus on growth and retaining your power app users.

This is what you need to look at every single day to track campaign performance, conversion rates, user analytics, daily actives.

You can easily create campaigns to nudge your users whether that's a push notification, interstitials, and even reach users through Facebook and Google too.

The platform is very powerful and can process millions of data points.

More than the platform itself, I love how they value their clients and always felt they are part of my team whenever we need their help and guidance with our impossible-to-happen campaigns.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
While they are able to create an impact and have the ability to scale, I personally think they need to invest more hiring additional people to lend a hand to their limited talented resources.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
The power of its analytics and ability to build marketing automation with this platform

all_reviews.review_title: Clever TAP Movil Marketing, comfort and spaciousness.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
It is a platform that allows us to carry out effective mobile marketing, through the creation of customer participation strategies and thus obtain significant growth. It provides information and analysis in real time to create the best experiences for customers, it is easy to use and its interface is clean, organized and attractive. I must also emphasize that its customer service is very good.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Our experience has been satisfactory and we have not presented problems, in fact in a couple of opportunities the customer service was contacted for doubts about a function of the platform and they treated me in the best way, the only unfavorable thing I have seen so far it is that the cost of the platform when comparing it with others is a bit high.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
Clever Tap allows you to maintain a constant workflow for your entire team, it also provides you with information in real time based on an analysis of user data that allows you to provide each client with the best possible experience. You can carry out campaigns and increase your reach and customer acquisition, you also have access by mobile and desktop, totally recommended.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use this software as it provides you with information through analysis on user data, this allows the automation tools to perform the best actions to understand the customer and create campaigns. We also track daily conversion rates, campaigns, daily assets among others. Our work team obtains a more fluid performance and time savings that we can channel in other areas of the company or we simply focus on increasing our productivity, even allowing us to offer a quality experience to customers, we are happy with the results, it has been good choice.

all_reviews.review_title: A great tool for engaging all events on the app
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
CleverTap is a great tool for collating all events that take place on an app and then acting on them through Push Notifications, Inbox and Email. It also allows quick access to analytics on events and is flexible enough to allow for information to be queried easily, even by those who are new to the platform.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
CleverTap can be slow on most days, especially when used within a large organisation.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
Great tool for the CRM team for sending Push Notifications at the right time, based on real time triggers and not just anytime that is as per communication schedule.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We solve all problems related to communicating with our users based on live triggers on the application. Live triggers outperform general push notifications significantly.

all_reviews.review_title: My experience using clevertap
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Easy to use, supports a lot of functions & use cases, easy integrations, very user friendly.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
UI lags a bit during very very high concurrency (This also tends to be the time when we need to be fast)

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
Take onboarding seriously, understand how it can be used, get access to customer support, make sure you maintain events hygiene. Clevertap like any other SaaS platform is garbage in garbage out; if you send junk not actionable data, you wont be able to do much. Also events hygiene as a debt item is painful, so don't ignore this!

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Personalised communications, using it to power dynamic rules (like a rule-engine), to create end-to-end user journeys, to communicate with specific cohorts, to automate communications.

Also events hygiene as a debt item is painful, so don't ignore this!

all_reviews.review_title: Product insights can be complex - obtaining them shouldn't!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
CleverTap provides clear mechanisms to understand what your users are doing, and how to engage with them.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Some tools can be a bit convoluted, and can require some adjustment from the product team to maximze. Implementation can also be a technical challenge if your team has no experience with instrumentation on the regular.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
Be sure that you're not looking for user behaviors and interactions, as tools like HotJar are better suited for that.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're better able to understand what our users do when the engage with our app - this in turn normalizes our user journey maps, and keeps the team on the ground when it comes to user engagement. Additionally, we have concrete data on feature usage, which helps us prioritize improvements for our customers.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent tool for marketing and analytics
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
CleverTap is an amazing authoritative, incorporated, and wide-ranging tool that provides actual performance analytics and user involvement, that can be used by the brands to better recognize and involve the users. Many of the important global companies such as Samsung, Star Network, Sony, etc. use this tool as it assists you to simulate user actions and inspire them to achieve the desired activities. The product and customer support teams of CleverTap positively receive feedback and efforts to accommodate the needs.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
It has more emphasis on mobile apps than on the website. It is a little expensive for smaller organizations. When performing multiple tasks, the system slows down. There is no built-in option for message or email, so it needs the incorporation of third-party tools. As the quantity of the information to be stored exceeds the limit, its cost increases.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
CleverTap supports the marketers to recognize and answer to the client's requirements by giving a 360 view of application users through networks and devices. It enables mobile marketers to better comprehend the user performance and make effective engagement strategies by coupling a strong analytics tool to an appropriate engagement set up. CleverTap assists you to completely enhance the campaign expenditures throughout every network.

all_reviews.review_title: CleverTap works great but my onboarding process did not explain its implementation complexity
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
I like best how easy it is to see segments of users and recent activity, but also see profiles.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
I disliked the need to have all our events sent client-side in order to have the best profiles in the CleverTap system, and how the complexities of profile creation and merging were not explained in my onboarding and only came to light over time.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
Before you decide to implement, if you are looking to integrate Segment with CleverTap, make sure your Segment event infrastructure is set up properly and logically. It will be more difficult to use CleverTap if this is not the case; it is not CleverTap's fault, just the fact that you will rely on Segment event labeling.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Setting up re-engagement campaigns quickly and easily via email, push, and text without engineering effort - we have realized this benefit quite well and are happy we chose CleverTap.

all_reviews.review_title: !Una de las mejores herramientas!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
CleverTap es un paseo para el Mobile Marketing y datos analiticos obtenido de dicha ramificacion. La caracteristica que es mi favorita -a pesar de que posee muchas- es la capacidad de analizar la data y detectar anomalias en tuneles lo cual permite hacer ajustes a cada producto a fin de continuar en el camino deseado y proyectar las metas esperadas. Ademas, es capaz de procesar larga data asociada a cada producto por el cual es utilizado. Por ello, permite la implementacion constante de actualizacion ajustadas a un mercado que varia con muchisima rapidez. !Me encanta!

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
El proceso de implementacion es un poco tedioso y engorroso, puesto que no es una herramienta para ser utilizada por cualquier tipo de usuario con niveles basicos de conocimiento tecnologico. Seria necesario una induccion y/o entrenamiento para aprovechar cada funcion adecuadamente. Asimismo, las alertas a destiempo pueden ser un problema para arreglar errores generales en cada producto.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
La unica recomendacion que puedo ofrecer es que inviertan en entrenamiento o capaciten a un usuario maestro a fin de personalizar adecuadamente CleverTap para que haga exactamente lo que cada compania necesita acorde a sus objetivos y al motivo por el cual invirtio en esta herramienta.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
El mayor beneficio que aporto a nuestra compania esta increible herramienta fue arrojar datos importantes del seguimiento del comportamiento de nuestros usuarios lo cual nos permitio adaptarnos a las nuevas tendencias y visualizar tanto como proyectarnos a futuro.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about CleverTap?
review_question_answers.answer: CleverTap es un paseo para el Mobile Marketing y datos analiticos obtenido de dicha ramificacion. La caracteristica que es mi favorita -a pesar de que posee muchas- es la capacidad de analizar la data y detectar anomalias en tuneles lo cual permite hacer ajustes a cada producto a fin de continuar en el camino deseado y proyectar las metas esperadas. Ademas, es capaz de procesar larga data asociada a cada producto por el cual es utilizado. Por ello, permite la implementacion constante de actualizacion ajustadas a un mercado que varia con muchisima rapidez. !Me encanta!

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about CleverTap?
review_question_answers.answer: El proceso de implementacion es un poco tedioso y engorroso, puesto que no es una herramienta para ser utilizada por cualquier tipo de usuario con niveles basicos de conocimiento tecnologico. Seria necesario una induccion y/o entrenamiento para aprovechar cada funcion adecuadamente. Asimismo, las alertas a destiempo pueden ser un problema para arreglar errores generales en cada producto.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
review_question_answers.answer: La unica recomendacion que puedo ofrecer es que inviertan en entrenamiento o capaciten a un usuario maestro a fin de personalizar adecuadamente CleverTap para que haga exactamente lo que cada compania necesita acorde a sus objetivos y al motivo por el cual invirtio en esta herramienta.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: El mayor beneficio que aporto a nuestra compania esta increible herramienta fue arrojar datos importantes del seguimiento del comportamiento de nuestros usuarios lo cual nos permitio adaptarnos a las nuevas tendencias y visualizar tanto como proyectarnos a futuro.

all_reviews.review_title: De lo mejor para dirigir el Mobile Marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Es una de las mejores herramientas de Mobile marketing que he utilizado en un largo periodo de tiempo. La caracteristica que mas utilizamos en mi compania y la mas resaltante considero que es la capacidad de lanzar campanas unica y exclusivamente a raiz de los analisis arrojados del procesamiento de datos online y offline de los usuarios.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Cuando se utilizan datos pesados y archivos grandes, el procesamiento de flujogramas puede ser un poco lento y tedioso, haciendo que los procesos se retrasen un poco. En mi opinion, no es nada por lo cual descartar esta herramienta.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
Mi mayor recomendacion seria considerar implementar este producto e invertir un poco en entrenamiento para aprovechar cada una de sus caracteristicas y la capacidad de personalizarlo, tanto de acuerdo a la situacion y a la lectura de analiticos como al cronograma ya establecido del comercio.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Nosotros utilizamos esta herramienta para monitorear datos de los usuarios que acceden a nuestras campanas y lanzarlas acorde a los analisis obtenidos a partir del registro y orden de dichos datos. El programa lo hace relativamente facil y, una vez implementado por completo, es bastante facil de usar.

all_reviews.review_title: Clevertap is a must
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
The Smart Campaigns feature is awesome. With that feature, you can just set up push campaigns once and forget about sending push messages to new users, the platform will do it for you. You can set triggers, so once a user does something specific, he will receive an automated message.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
The only "but" we found on Clevertap is that their dashboard is only available in English. They should add more languages like Spanish, Italian and French at least.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
You should definitely give Clevertap a try. It will make your life easier. Even if you think at first that the pricing is high, you will realize that it is much cheaper than having one or two full time employees doing all the work.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Because of the huge volume of apps and users that Mobincube has, it used to be imposible to take care of sending customized push messages to all of them in order to keep a good level of loyalty. With Clevertap and its smart campaigns, we just need to configure those campaigns once and then new users will start receiving messages as a reaction of their actions.

all_reviews.review_title: Intuitive, Feature rich and Accurate - Must have for teams of all sizes
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
The toolkit enables powerful marketing automations out of the box. If not for CT, our team would need to spend several days and weeks building the same set of automations. Further, the analytics capabilities are at par with most tools out there and sufficient for most day to day use cases for product and growth teams.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Some of the queries especially around Funnels and Flows can be slow, especially when using a large dataset. Further, user flow analysis, as of now, has limited capabilities.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
1. Measure acquisition activities: Drill down into the performance of each of our acquisition activities, ensuring they drive meaningful results
2. Run re-engagement campaigns: Utilize user segmentation to run targeted re-engagement activities to drive overall business metrics
3. Monitor product metrics daily: Create dashboards providing 360 degree view of the business as well as views for respective functions
4. Customer communication: Multi-channel communication facilitating both mass and segmented campaigns

all_reviews.review_title: An all-you-need analytics suite for growing startups
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
What I like best is I haven't needed to look at any other analytics tool since we brought in Clevertap. Except for measuring session time which is overall becoming difficult & attribution analytics, Clevertap has literally everything under the sun & it is definitely the most robust tool we have used in the last 3 years. We use it for Funnels, Cohorts, Trends, and the Dashboard is definitely useful.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
They should bring in advanced features like- email reports for dashboards & anomaly alerts. Also, not every analytics output can be pinned to the dashboard. If the support was on-call more than it is on email, it would have helped us better.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
Event nomenclature is something that seems unimportant, but if you're gonna have folks from different verticals use analytics, pay very close attention to this & you'll be sailing happily.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Clevertap to study user behavior, trends and understand different cohorts and funnels which help us better the product. We intend to soon use this for cross-platform analytics (web & native android).

all_reviews.review_title: One of the best marketing automation solution out there! `
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
CleverTap is a customer lifecycle management and engagement platform that gathers data on any platform for behavioural analysis of the users. Some of the points that I'd like to highlight:
- Easy setup
- Real-time data gathering
- Ability to set up campaigns for real-time as well as past behaviour segment's users
- Good visual reports

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
1. The feature called 'Journey' can't be edited once you set it up and go live. If you want to make changes then you have to clone it and make changes and pause the previous one. It can be a time consuming process if the journey is a little complicated.
2. There should be an option to check the user's data for the CSV file upload of the users.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We provide whitelabled apps for multiple brands along with web apps. It becomes crucial for us to track user behaviour across all apps and see how users are interacting with our products. We get actionable insights by using funnels and steps where we can improve the UX. We have made multiple iterations of the product based on the data we get from the Clevertap. We have also set up multiple marketing campaigns by using

all_reviews.review_title: CleverTap Review
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
The best of CleverTap is its features range. We use it as a complete CRM platform: user segmentation, audience building, journey campaigns and performance tracking are some of its main capabilities.
To make it better, its customer service is thorough, attentive and very friendly.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
It does not have a built-in SMS provider nor an e-mail provider. So these features require integration with third parties.
And, as you use it and pile up data do be stored, its services gets pricier.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use CleverTap throughout all of our CRM processes. User acquisition with targeted member to member communication, activation journey campaigns, reactivation through remarketing and special offers, segmentation of specific users with specific actions, etc. Beyond that, we use Clevertap to keep track of several KPIs and campaign performance, such as user engagement, user cohorts, AB tests, uninstalls, etc. One major problem that it does address is the possibility to personalize the content we deliver to our users; at the same time, its intelligence selects the right time and situation to do it. The level of detail possible to manage is excellent.

all_reviews.review_title: A really good tool for Marketing.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
I liked how complete the platform is. Clevertap helps you analyze what happens on your website and in the app, you can find insights and make better decisions. Also on the same platform you can create automatic campaigns according to each segment. Automatic campaigns really help the work of the marketing area. The team can focus more on creating strategies.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
It has small errors sometimes, however, the support team solves any problem very quickly. I appreciate how quickly they answered my questions. They have excellent customer service.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
I really recommend Clevertap. It is a tool that has everything. It is the dream of any marketer

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We had several platforms that help us analyze what happened on the web and the app and send marketing campaigns. With Clevertap we could have everything in one platform. In addition to following all the way of the consumer through the different devices.

all_reviews.review_title: CleverTap provides us powerful tools to run automated campaigns and insightful customer analysis
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
- Great on-boarding experience.
- Easy to use dashboard.
- Plenty of ways to interact with customers (for both web and mobile apps).
- Many ways of extracting insightful information on customer behavior.
- Data is not only insightful but also actionable: there are usually buttons next to the data providing actions to improve the results.
- Also some really interesting machine learning applications (like goal prediction, best time to deliver, recommendations).

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Until the moment I couldn't find anything I dislike.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
In case you are considering other products, be sure to check the following CleverTap features before taking a decision:
- RFM Segmentation
- Journeys
- Best Time to Deliver
- Intent Based Segmentation
- Goal Prediction

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We expect we'll be able to achieve a high level of engagement with our customers through the distribution of personalized discounts and also to provide them a much better customer service.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful mobile marketing platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Clevertap is a robust mobile marketing platform that allows us to optimise our customer acquisition, engagement and retention efforts. It gives us the ability to analyse customer behaviours to determine what, how, when they are doing things in our app, and create contextual multi channel campaigns to drive engagement. Customers can fall in and out journeys based on conversion actions events - delivering the most personalised experience. Additionally, from a product perspective, the team is able to measure and analyse the impact of new product features/ flows/ enhancements.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Clevertap takes a little while to implement properly, however, it is worthwhile to get event and property tags correct the first time.

We have also run into some campaign sending errors from time to time and there aren't any notifications that alert you to this, so monitoring is key.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
Highly recommend

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Personalised onboarding journeys that drive users to complete a payment/ transaction event within the Golden Window for maximum retention.
Ability to distribute campaign promotions to certain segments based on past behaviours.
Increased engagement and retention of active users with email and push notification campaigns.
Mobile analytics - measuring the impact of new products/ flows/ enhancements on engagement and retention.

all_reviews.review_title: Making the Marketing team independent
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Omni Channel Communication,  Able to manage the different communication channels at one place, helping us to engage users in a more sophisticated way.   The user segmentation is very good, we can segment users based on the activities they did on our platform. That helps us to promote the content to relevant users and do better matchmaking leading to higher engagement rates.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
No safari and Firefox push notification support at the moment. So, loosing out a lot of users.  But it's in their roadmap, looking forward to seeing it soon.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
If you have not ever used any product similar to this. You should definitely try or at least see a demo.  The tools gives hundreds of ways/combinations to engage your existing customers or visitors. So, the only constraint that will remain is your team's imagination to use it.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Segmenting the users based on the content they are exploring on our platform.
Omnichannel communication. All communication endpoint in one place makes life easier.
Our marketing team became independent, they no longer need the tech team to do data mining to find a segment of users and they don't need anyone to design emails/HTML for them.

all_reviews.review_title: One tool for product & marketing needs
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
I like the fact that Clevertap is comprehensive in its offering both as an analytics solution and customer engagement. So all stake holders right from product / engineering / marketing to leadership end up being users of Clevertap.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
To harness the true capabilities of the product - Clevertap requires marketing and tech to partner and work together for a proper implementation. So it isn't exactly a trivial project.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
Map your requirements and what level of integration would serve these needs well.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are looking to reduce customer drop-offs at key on-boarding points with Clevertap. We can see this can be largely automated using Clevertap. For our product team Clevertap opens up a lot of insights on how users are using our product and where the drop-offs are happening.

We also like to reach out to our global customers with different messaging for different countries. That is easy with Clevertap. We also have the ability to target users depending on their status with us. So different customers get different messaging depending on where they are in their usage of our product.

Our users end up being from both web and mobile app, so having a combined profile and view of what these users are doing is very helpful to us. Clevertap does that well.

all_reviews.review_content:

- Helps us manage acquisition, analysis and engagement at one place, which is extremely productive for our team.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
- Can't use time-spent as a native metric.
- Some native events like app installs, app launches often don't match with other sources.

Use this if you need to manage the acquisition, analytics, and engagement from one place.

We wanted to build a data-centric culture across the team, and the easy to use analytics gives us the ability to achieve this.
Engagement and analytics are in a single platform which helps the team take actions based on insights without moving out of the system.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Mobile Tech Lead & Head of Solutions Engineer

all_reviews.review_title: Great tool to perform a market analysis.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
CleverTap is a very complete tool to perform a complete analysis of user behavior, which allows us to have a more effective understanding of the tastes of the people we want to analyze, thanks to this we can see clearly, who look at the sites of our competitors, and thus offer them, something better or equal, so we have a large retention of people within our business, thanks to the precise data on the actions performed by users on other sites, we can create a set of personalized preferences for each one of them, showing them what they want to see, and so we avoid them from going to our pages, to other places to look for the same thing, or something different from what they offer them.


What do you dislike about CleverTap?
The application can be a bit slow in some kind of work, when different tasks are performed within the application, this can stop for a few seconds, some things are missing to be optimized, I would like the reports to be a little more detailed, to you need a lot of compatibility with other tools and applications, a system of these must be free to complement any marketing tool, not see other tools as your competitors but as your add-ons, since you will always use different similar tools, that one expects to be easily complemented.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
It is a great tool to effectively monitor the behavior of users, but before implementing this system, compatibility should be analyzed with other products.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Since we use this tool we can make a better study of the data and the information about the users, since we have this tool that allows us to do a follow-up to each one of them.

all_reviews.review_content:

What's better than saving cost on a headcount for a Data Analyst in the CRM team when you can tap on CleverTap's extensive analytical capabilities?

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
There is a learning curve that will take a while, and you may have tons of questions during the first few months. But once you're past that it's good.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
Get on the trial period and explore the analytical capabilities. If the ability to analyse your segments and users based on your "critical events" is highly necessary, CleverTap is the solution for you.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's solving the need to continuously activate our users, and keep them engaged/delighted with our app through timely notifications.

A great benefit from this product is also the ability to segment users very easily. Plus, from any parts of your analyses,  you can immediately send a campaign.

all_reviews.review_content:

1. It has many options to play around your users.
2. I can check every minute detail about my customers through the dashboard itself which very useful
3. I can send many communications to people along with a lot of features like images, global limits etc.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
1. Sometimes the dashboard works very slow, if many tabs are opened.
2. There is no option to unsubscribe a customer from your communications, you always need to upload a csv on the system even for a single customer.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
1. selecting right customer for right communication.
2. sending diff kinds of communication through a single dashborad

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
1. The ability to transform collected data into valuable susceptible segments which that can be directly targeted using the RFM technique available.

2. The analytics leg of the tool on top a campaign engine helps glean good inputs about consumer behaviour/business trends.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
While this can be an issue pertinent to the sector I work for (Telecom), the raw files that I download using my primary key gets merged which essentially translates to manual cleaning of atleast 10% of the file.
If multiple numbers are aligned to one email ID on seperate devices (corporate consumers), I can still segregate them but, if multiple profiles are created using one phone, it's a mess.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
Must use.
But, best wielded when use completely.
All integrations should be made from an omnichannel perspective.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
1. Reduction of dropouts during our signature journeys (Bill payment/Recharges)
2. Ploughback of lost revenue through reminders/drop messages
3. Increase in retention(%) of consumers -- Reduction in churn

all_reviews.review_title: A very promising product which is designed for scale
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
I used this product for my own personal webapp and mobile app. My DAU and MAU have been on the rise and I was essentially impressed with the functionality of "FLOWS"
To be able to see the breaking points in the user experience and create a plusher experience was my top requirement.
To top it all, I created multiple user journeys and now am mapping just the user behavior.
Additionally, Funnels, Pivots and the newly launched Intent based segmentation are also something that people like me who are looking to generate revenue would highly use before our campaigns.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
It is a little hard to choose for I dislike. Dislike is too strong a word but I guess, they can train people in companies to use the product. I mentioned that once and ever since they have started this "CleverTap Confluence" where they come to cities in person and do a full length product walkthrough, business cases pitch.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
As my business s very new and recent
- User Engagement is a key aspect
- It is followed by User retention
- Marketing Automation

The Journeys have definitely helped in saving a lot of my time. For engagement I have a great variety of channels to sue from but I only use Web Push and Mobile Push as of now. For retention I am mostly relying on their Analytics stack which is proving to be very beneficial as they create insights out of  user data and most of the time these insights could surpass the human eye.

all_reviews.review_title: A fantastic way to understand user behaviour, improve engagement and run targeted campaigns
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
1. The UI
2. Segmentation
3. Third-party integrations
4. Dashboards
5. Journey feature
6. Cohort analysis

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
1. App uninstall data isn't clear. E.g. in a month if there are 1,000 uninstalls, the system doesn't count any new device reinstalls, from the same user login
2. Discrepancy in third-party data; e.g. Bit.ly clicks don't match the platform data with CleverTap data
3. Deliverability of third-party communication, through CleverTap; e.g. reduced deliverability of SMS

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Understanding user behaviour in terms of app usage, behaviour by time of day, engagement and stickiness, behaviour by geography. Improved response to time-bound, targeted campaigns and substantial increase in revenue.

all_reviews.review_title: Power Infra and Realtime Engagement
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
I have been using CleverTap for over three years now.

We had tried multiple providers to send push notifications through our app, but none of them could handle the traffic and load of our user-base, especially during important sports matches or TV show releases. CleverTap, having a powerful infrastructure, could easily handle our load and could send realtime notifications to all our users. We could thus schedule and send massive campaigns in just a few seconds without worrying about deliverability.

CleverTap is backed by a great customer success team, who eased the migration process and also helped us automate a plethora of our marketing use-cases.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Well, with the scale they have managed to create, they need more manpower! Irony is, they have managed creating an impact with very few talented resources.

Recommendations to others considering CleverTap:
Integrate CleverTapSee the change realtime :)

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automating the notification engine!

all_reviews.review_title: Best mix of analytics & marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
- Ability to create live segments with large traffic volumes
- Product/support team that takes feedback positively
- Analytics and engagement in a single package is wonderful

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
More focus on app analytics than for websites.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have been using CleverTap for over 4 years now for Pricebaba.com and now in our new product, SahiGST as well. The results have been amazing. Analytics and engagement in a single package is wonderful. It's quite easy to segment users based on what they have done on the website and that too real time. Their funnels are the best I've seen - it is possible to set it up within a few seconds. Also, their new Flows feature has helped us understand where exactly the user dropped off and what actions were performed right before that. We have used web pop ups and emails extensively.
They have a fantastic customer success team that has been very responsive to all our calls and emails.

all_reviews.review_title: Complete and accessible tracking & analytics solution. Fantastic customer support.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Overall the product is well designed, easy to understand and works well.
The technical documentation is thorough.
The pricing is reasonable. The initial free package is generous and allows to do much before paying the first dime.
Customer support is fantastic. I've been sending tons of questions to their technical expert, Sumitra, during our integration phase and she never failed to respond within a the hour (couple of hours max), or jump on a call to further assist.

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
Although apps can do much within the free package, some fairly basic features do require payment, such as being able to get the list of users who performed a specific action. Not having access to such features within the free package has made testing and reporting more difficult.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
CleverTap is the solution we get detailed analytics of our app usage.

all_reviews.review_title: Best Product Analytics Software in the market
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about CleverTap?
Clevertap has the best app analytics features in the market. It allows you to engage in cohort analysis and segment users by their activities in the most seamless way possible. I love the fact that you can incorporate server based messaging as well, which a lot of other tools in the market don't allow. Highly recommend Clevertap to everybody looking for any actionable data about their product!

What do you dislike about CleverTap?
There is nothing that I dislike about the product. The product features & quality is exceptional.

What problems is CleverTap solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's really helped me identify my bottlenecks in the onboarding process + comprehend different user pathways. The data on clevertap was helpful for me to improve our UX to reduce as much friction as possible in the app and increase our retention and therefore, sales!
